text.p: These are the leading stories in the Algerian press on Sunday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- The Transitional National Council resumes session on Monday to debate state budget.
- Prime Minister Ahmed Ouyahia says Algeria triumphs over "terrorism".
- Home-made bomb explosion kills a schoolgirl and wounds another in Tipaza, near Algiers.
- Security forces kill more than 20 gunmen in separate operations in Algiers.
- University teachers' union to sue ministry officials over dismissing demands for more pay.
- Algiers' local authorities ban opposition Socialist Forces Front party from staging protest march in the city.
